security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill that provides patterns and guidance for using Claude's parallel execution features. It contains no executable code, network calls, or file operations - only educational content about how to use existing Claude Code functionality.

content.user_title: Run Multiple AI Tasks in Parallel
content.value_statement: Stop waiting for AI tasks to complete one by one. This skill shows you how to run multiple subagents simultaneously, reducing execution time from hours to minutes.
actual_capabilities: Execute multiple subagents simultaneously using Task tool
Reduce total execution time by running tasks in parallel
Coordinate independent tasks across different code areas
Implement dynamic subagent patterns for complex workflows
Use TodoWrite to track parallel task progress
limitations: Tasks must be independent with no dependencies
All Task calls must be in a single assistant message
Cannot parallelize tasks that modify the same files
Sequential workflows still require traditional execution

best_practices: Ensure tasks are truly independent before parallelizing
Use descriptive subagent prompts with clear roles and expectations
Retrieve all TaskOutput results before synthesizing final response
anti_patterns: Running tasks in separate messages (forces sequential execution)
Parallelizing tasks that modify the same files (causes conflicts)
Using parallel execution for dependent workflows (breaks dependencies)

faq.question: Which AI tools support parallel execution?
faq.answer: Parallel execution works with Claude and Claude Code using the Task tool with run_in_background parameter.

faq.question: How many tasks can run in parallel?
faq.answer: There's no hard limit, but practical considerations suggest 3-7 tasks for optimal performance and result synthesis.

faq.question: Can I integrate parallel execution with existing workflows?
faq.answer: Yes, parallel execution integrates seamlessly with TodoWrite and other Claude Code features for comprehensive workflow management.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using parallel subagents?
faq.answer: Yes, all subagents operate within Claude's secure environment and don't share sensitive data between tasks.

faq.question: Why are my tasks running sequentially instead of in parallel?
faq.answer: Ensure all Task calls are in a single assistant message and each has run_in_background: true set.

faq.question: How does this compare to traditional sequential execution?
faq.answer: Parallel execution can reduce total time from N×task_time to max(task_time), providing near-linear speedup for independent tasks.
